posts.post_content:
I really appreciate the fact that there is a ![1000000](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1000000&type=symbol) icon in the Gatherer markup exclusively for this card. Thanks to [Mox Lotus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mox Lotus), there's also a ![100](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=100&type=symbol) icon, and presumably one for infinity mana as well, but I haven't been able to find it yet.  
  
As for the card, it's a perfect example of *Unhinged* hilarity. I can only imagine the insanity that would arise from playing a game when one hit the field.
posts.html:

As for the card, it's a perfect example of Unhinged hilarity. I can only imagine the insanity that would arise from playing a game when one hit the field.

posts.post_content: Okay ,guys , this card would be HILARIOUS with Mindscreeker and Training Grounds ! Put 4 in to a deck with both of those cards and you should eventually reveal one and get +1 million attack and defence points !!!! Thats kind of a win condition card , like Exodia the Forbidden One in Yugioh; you would never really actually PLAY any of the pieces of Exodia on the field ( well unless you were totally desperate ) but hold them in your hand . This would be a fun card to play in such a deck built around high mana cost cards and revealing /milling them . Also Cerebral eruption .
posts.html:

Thats kind of a win condition card , like Exodia the Forbidden One in Yugioh; you would never really actually PLAY any of the pieces of Exodia on the field ( well unless you were totally desperate ) but hold them in your hand . This would be a fun card to play in such a deck built around high mana cost cards and revealing /milling them . Also Cerebral eruption .
